query:
SELECT
                c.id as channel_id,
                COUNT(m.id) as "unread_count!"
            FROM channels c
            LEFT JOIN channel_read_state crs
                ON crs.channel_id = c.id AND crs.user_id = $1
            LEFT JOIN messages m
                ON m.channel_id = c.id
                AND (crs.last_read_at IS NULL OR m.created_at > crs.last_read_at)
            WHERE c.id = ANY($2)
            GROUP BY c.id
